unranked.name: Unranked Duels
unranked.description: 1v1 and team duels including Sword, Mace, UHC, Crystal, and more.

ranked.name: Ranked Duels
ranked.description: Play for elo in 1vs1s against other players in the kits Sword, Axe, UHC, Crystal, SMP, Mace, and Skywars.

party.name: Party Duels
party.description: Host parties for your community, split into two teams.

bots.name: Bots
bots.description: Play alone against a Bot in Sword, when no friends are online.
